text: Zopa is a UK-based company putting lenders and borrowing in contact. Zopa or ZOPA may also refer to: * Zone of possible agreement, a business theory term dealing with negotiations * Thubten Zopa Rinpoche (born 1946), a Nepali lama from Khumbu, the entryway to Mount Everest * Tenzin Zopa (born 1975), Nepalese Tibetan Buddhist monk of the Mahayana tradition
title: Zopa (disambiguation)
